description: This file is a C header file that includes necessary header files, defines licensing and copyright information, and declares functions for conversion of string to various data types within the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) framework, specifically related to the parameter tree implementation.

methods.name: SlapVcoStringToUint32
methods.description: Converts a string to a uint32 value within the context of the SLAP framework.

methods.name: SlapVcoStringToBool
methods.description: Converts a string to a boolean value within the SLAP framework.

methods.name: SlapVcoStringToInt
methods.description: Converts a string to an integer value within the SLAP framework.
